pkgmetadata.longdescription: An open source stacking software for astronomical images taken with a DSLR camera. PyAstroStack can calibrate, debayer, register, align and stack photos taken with modern DSLR's from Canon. It has a command line user interface inspired by AstroSurf IRIS.

use.flag: Enables OpenCL support and pulls in pyopencl. This makes some operations much faster but requires specific hardware and drivers.
